text: In my mind the city of Ariel is a thorn in Israel's side and a serious obstacle to peace.
author: Theodore Bikel

text: Care less for your harvest than for how it is shared and your life will have meaning and your heart will have peace.
author: Kent Nerburn

text: Before, for me, peace could have been synonymous with boredom.
author: Isabelle Adjani

text: The greatest problem all around the world today, whether in America, Japan, China Russia, India or anywhere else in the world, is that people are not in peace. People want peace.
author: Prem Rawat

text: Smiling is very important. If we are not able to smile, then the world will not have peace. It is not by going out for a demonstration against nuclear missiles that we can bring about peace. It is with our capacity of smiling, breathing, and being peace that we can make peace.
author: Nhat Hanh
